And here it is‚Ä¶

USAID more than doubled its spending on Brazil as soon as Bolsonaro won the 2018 election. This wasn‚Äôt because Brazil suddenly needed twice the aid; the money was spent on projects aimed at overthrowing the Brazilian government.

The 2022 Brazilian election was stolen from Bolsonaro just as the 2020 U.S. election was stolen from Donald Trump and from Kari Lake in 2022, with USAID and the CIA involved in installing election-rigging machines that Brazilians didn‚Äôt even want.

Just months before the election, CIA Director William Burns visited Brazil and warned Bolsonaro not to cast doubt on the voting machines or contest the election results ‚Äî implying the newly installed machines were compromised.

Additionally, Defense Secretary Lloyd ‚ÄúWoke‚Äù Austin ‚Äî a DEI hire ‚Äî visited Brazil and pressured the Chief of the Brazilian Armed Forces to accept the election results and support Lula, a convicted felon and self-proclaimed communist.

In other words, the overthrow of the U.S. government overthrew the Brazilian government via USAID ‚Äî all at the expense of the American taxpayer.

quoted.text:
2007A 36-year-old Elon Musk sits down for a quiet PBS interview and says, almost casually:

‚ÄúThe most important thing we can do for the future of consciousness is to become a multi-planetary species‚Ä¶ Everything else pales in comparison.‚Äù

He then predicts, with zero hype:

‚Ä¢Fully reusable rockets that land like   airplanes
‚Ä¢Electric cars that outperform gasoline in every way and go mass-market
‚Ä¢Solar + batteries becoming the cheapest energy on Earth
‚Ä¢Humans on Mars and a self-sustaining city there

Jeff Bezos was already the richest man on Earth in 2007.
He started Blue Origin in 2000 with the exact same ‚Äúmulti-planetary‚Äù dream.

18+ years later: 
Blue Origin has flown exactly zero orbital missions. New Glenn still hasn‚Äôt launched. No reusable booster has ever landed. No Mars plan with dates.

Elon?
‚Ä¢Falcon 9 boosters have landed 400+ times
‚Ä¢Starship (bigger than anything ever built) is flying
‚Ä¢Tesla sells 2 million cars a year and is worth more than the rest of the car industry combined
‚Ä¢Solar + batteries are now the cheapest electricity source in history
‚Ä¢First uncrewed Starships to Mars: 2026‚Äì2028. Crewed: late 2020s/early 2030s ‚Äî exactly the timeline he gave in 2007
The vision never wavered. Not once.

The enthusiasm is the same calm, burning conviction you hear in that 2007 clip today.

The determination? He went personally bankrupt in 2008 keeping SpaceX and Tesla alive with his last dollars.

Almost 20 years later, every single ‚Äúcrazy‚Äù prediction from that interview is either already reality or on schedule.

This is what relentless execution looks like.

Watch the 2007 interview (25 minutes that aged like fine wine):

He didn‚Äôt just dream about the future.

He scheduled it. And showed up.

tweets.text: RT @Gwynne_Shotwell: Today marks an incredible milestone as Ukraine becomes the first European country to make @Starlink Direct to Cell ava‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
Today marks an incredible milestone as Ukraine becomes the first European country to make @Starlink Direct to Cell available to customers!!

The satellite-to-mobile service is powering life-saving connectivity when and where people need it most - during prolonged blackouts or in areas where terrestrial networks are often damaged. Looking forward to connecting more people in Europe with our next-generation capabilities!

quoted.text:
Today marks a historic moment for @TwiyKyivstar, as it becomes the first mobile operator in Europe to launch @Starlink Direct to Cell satellite technology for its customers in Ukraine.

Now, all Kyivstar customers in Ukraine with 4G smartphones can stay connected through Starlink Direct to Cell, even when the terrestrial network is not available.

First through SMS, and later with voice and data, this technology isn‚Äôt just back up technology - it‚Äôs a new definition of resilience to keep Ukraine connected.

Find out more ‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/MlBr10eqyf
